String.Name: SapAXLSelectDestDir
String.En: Please select the destination folder for SAP Interactive Excel %SapAXLVersion%.

String.Name: SapAXLExcelx86NotFound
String.En:
● Microsoft Excel could not be found. You need one of the following versions:
● ■ Microsoft Excel 2010 (32 bit)
● ■ Microsoft Excel 2013 (32 bit)
● ■ Microsoft Excel 2016 (32 bit)

String.Name: SapAXLExcelx64NotFound
String.En:
● Microsoft Excel could not be found. You need one of the following versions:
● ■ Microsoft Excel 2010 (32 bit or 64 bit)
● ■ Microsoft Excel 2013 (32 bit or 64 bit)
● ■ Microsoft Excel 2016 (32 bit or 64 bit)

String.Name: SapAXLDotNet4x86NotFound
String.En: ● Microsoft .NET Framework 4.0 (32 bit) could not be found. This is needed in 32 bit also if used on a 64 bit enabled Windows.

String.Name: SapAXLDotNet4x64NotFound
String.En: ● Microsoft .NET Framework 4.0 (64 bit) could not be found. This is needed on 64 bit Windows with a 64 bit Microsoft Excel.

String.Name: SapAXLDotNet4NotFound
String.En: ● ■ Please download from here: Microsoft .NET Framework 4 download 32/64 bit

String.Name: SapAXLNco30x86NotFound
String.En:
● SAP Connector for Microsoft .NET 3.0 (NCo 3.0) (x86) could not be found.
● ■ NCo 3.0 is available for download on the SAP .NET Connector homepage
● ■ You can find details about the support strategy of the current versions in note 856863

String.Name: SapAXLNco30x64NotFound
String.En:
● SAP Connector for Microsoft .NET 3.0 (NCo 3.0) (x64) could not be found.
● ■ NCo 3.0 is available for download on the SAP .NET Connector homepage
● ■ You can find details about the support strategy of the current versions in note 856863

String.Name: SapAXLMSVSTO30NotInstalled
String.En:
● Microsoft Visual Studio 2010 Tools for Office Runtime 4.0 (VSTO) could not be found.
● ■ Please download from here: VSTO 4.0 Download
